title: Spacious and Newly Remodeled 1 BD Unit in Encino!!
posting_body: Angel & Jennifer | North Oak Real Estate Inv., Inc.
Spacious and Newly Remodeled 1 Bed + 1 Bath Unit in Encino!!
Rent STARTING AT: $2,095/month for apt. 215 and $2,350 for Apt. 315!
Encino towers is now offering a lovely 1 bed 1 bath spacious unit in the very heart of Encino life!
Just walk out your door for access to shopping and restaurants, parks, entertainment, transportation, and a beautiful community.
Apartment includes: Microwave, stove top, oven, dishwasher, and even a separate wet bar.
Kitchen and bathroom have brand new granite countertops, new laminate wood floors throughout, freshly carpeted bedrooms, central A/C and heat, and large closets.
This unit features amazing views of the San Fernando mountain range from your kitchen and private balcony.
The bedroom has new carpeting and brand new extra large mirrored closets.
There's even another walk-in closet in the hallway!
Enjoy with a full separate wet bar and tons of natural light pouring into this unit.
The building is well maintained with full-time professional manager onsite.
Building features a swimming pool, sauna, fitness center and laundry onsite.
The property is secured with an intercom system, gated parking, secured lobby, and beautiful surrounding neighborhood.
Come find your new home conveniently located near many other local establishments.
Angel & Jennifer | North Oak Real Estate Inv., Inc.
PHOTOS/3D TOUR MAY NOT REPRESENT THE ACTUAL UNIT WHICH IS FOR LEASE.
PLEASE CONTACT THE ON-SITE MANAGERS FOR MORE INFORMATION.
